mapper.select: select sm.menu_permission from s_menu sm join s_role_menu_mapping srmm on sm.menu_id = srmm.menu_id join s_role sr on srmm.role_id = sr.role_id join s_user_role_mapping surm on sr.role_id = surm.role_id join s_user su on surm.user_id = su.user_id where su.user_name = #{username}
select user_id as userId, user_name as username, password as password, create_date as createDate, last_update_date as lastUpdateDate from s_user where user_name = #{username}
select sr.role_name from s_role sr join s_user_role_mapping surm on sr.role_id = surm.role_id where surm.user_id = #{userInfo.userId};
